description:
Yoshiokadaira wants to quit Momoka`s bodyguard!  But why?  And then Natsumi desperately wants to invite Saburo-senpai to her Christmas party, but she can`t figure out how.  Why is she such a chicken?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Yoshiokadaira, Bodyguard Elegy / Natsumi, Christmas Meeting Operation
吉岡平 親衛隊哀歌(エレジー) / 夏美 クリスマス会大作戦
